New Records: Elly De La Cruz became the 3rd player in MLB history to have 100 stolen bases in their first two big league seasons, joining Rickey Henderson and Vince Coleman.
Elly De La Cruz is the fastest player to reach 100 steals and 100 extra-base hits in their first two seasons in the big leagues.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Elly De La Cruz passed up the Atlanta Braves with 65 steals on the season.
Elly De La Cruz is tied with the Minnesota Twins with 65 steals, and is just one behind the San Francisco Giants.
Others: Elly De La Cruz struck out twice in the game, tying the club record for strikeouts in a season, and surpassing Drew Stubbs on the list with 206.
